body.name: B Pack, Deluxe Reina Reef Collectible Doll and Playset with 11 Surprises, 3.5-inch, Kids Toys for Girls Ages 5 and up
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 6 mins
features: 2 WAYS TO PLAY: Play with the exclusive Reina Reef B Pack fashion doll and doll accessories or clip everything onto the metal chain to transform her into a stylish backpack accessory to take anywhere you go!
BOX TRANSFORMS TO PLAYSET: The reusable backpack-inspired box opens into a beachside doll playset – the themed beach and pier backdrops are perfect for pretend play storytelling!
UNIQUE UNBOXING: Unpack to discover your B Pack doll and accessories in printed blind bags. Each bag looks like something you’d find in your own backpack – sunglasses, accessories and more!

EXCLUSIVE DELUXE DOLL AND 11 SURPRISES: Open the bags to reveal your deluxe poseable small doll with real hair, a scrunchie, 3 mix and match doll clothes, 4 charms, a mini fabric backpack, the chain and more!

SURPRISE TOYS FOR 5 YEAR OLD GIRLS: B Pack kids toys are great gifts for 5 year old girls and up who love collectibles, dolls & accessories, toy figures & playsets. These dolls have an exciting unboxing and transform into a backpack accessory!
Includes: 1 Doll, 4 Fashion Pieces, 4 Charms, 1 Pom Pom, 1 Chain with Clip, 1 ID Card, 1 Miniature Backpack, 1 Playset, 1 Collector’s Guide, 1 Instruction Sheet
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: What’s in your backpack? Unpack it to discover an exclusive deluxe B Pack doll, Reina Reef, and 11 surprises. The Deluxe B Pack Backpack box even opens into a themed playset for your B Pack doll! B Pack girls toys are stylish and trendy 3.5-inch collectible small dolls with fashionable surprises, including a clip-on metal chain to transform your B Pack girl into a cool backpack accessory! Fold the front of the backpack down and peel and reveal the compartments to find whimsical blind bags containing your doll and her accessories. Each bag features playful artwork resembling items you’d really find in your own backpack: sunglasses, a water bottle, hair accessories and more! Open each blind bag to unbox your Reina Reef figure and her fashions, four charms, a fluffy pom-pom, mini fabric backpack, ID card, and the clip-on chain! With her oversized surf tee, checkered sneakers and soft lavender hair held back by a scrunchie, this VSCO girl is ready to hang out by the beach! For fun off the chain play, mix and match Reina Reef’s fashions to customize her look, accessorize her with charms like a skateboard and learn more about her on the ID card! Then, pose your doll and play inside the box. The beach and pier backdrops make this B Pack playset the perfect location for your storytelling! While you’re out on-the-go, connect the chain to your small doll and attach her accessories, then clip Reina Reef to your backpack, bag, or purse! For easy storage, you can remove the accessories from the chain and store the charms and doll clothes inside the mini backpack. Collect all of the B Pack mini dolls (toys each sold separately) and find your favorite styles, like E-Girl, Glam, Sporty and more! B Pack surprise toys for girls are for ages 5 and up. These dolls for girls make great birthday gifts for girls who enjoy collecting fashion dolls and small toys. Bring home the Deluxe B Pack Backpack and unpack all of your surprises!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: B Pack, 3.5-inch Collectible Dolls Exclusive Deluxe Doll & Playset with 11 Surprises Unpack the Deluxe B Pack Backpack to find an exclusive deluxe doll, Reina Reef, and 11 surprises! B Pack dolls all include a clip-on metal chain to transform your B Pack girl from doll into a trendy backpack accessory! Peel the box’s compartments to find bags with artwork resembling items in your own backpack. Reveal your doll, a scrunchie and 3 fashions, 4 charms, a pom pom, mini fabric backpack, ID card and the clip-on chain! After unboxing your doll and her fashionable surprises, the box opens into a playset, perfect for storytelling. Mix and match Reina Reef’s fashions and accessorize her with the charms, then pose her and play inside the box! Clip the chain onto your doll and add the charm accessories, then attach the chain to your backpack and take your exclusive doll anywhere you go! Includes: 1 Doll and 1 Chain with Clip 4 Fashion Pieces 4 Charms 1 Pom Pom 1 ID Card 1 Miniature Backpack 1 Playset Collector Guide and Instruction Sheet

2 Fun Ways to Play! Play with the set’s exclusive deluxe Reina Reef doll on or off the chain! Mix and match her fashions and play inside the box, then clip your doll and accessories onto the metal chain to transform her into a super stylish backpack accessory to take on-the-go! Box Becomes a Playset The reusable backpack box opens and transforms into a themed B Pack playset! Featuring super cute beach and pier graphic backdrops, this beachside playset is the perfect location for your storytelling. Hang out by the beach with VSCO girl, Reina Reef! Exclusive Doll & 11 Surprises Open each bag to reveal your poseable Reina Reef doll wearing a surf tee and scrunchie in her hair; plus, find 2 additional fashions, 4 charms, a fluffy pom pom, ID card, her clip-on chain and a trendy mini fabric backpack that can store everything inside!

Unique Unboxing Experience Fold down the front of the box to unpack Reina Reef and her fashionable surprises! Peel each panel open to find bags with playful artwork that look just like items you’d find in your own backpack: sunglasses, a water bottle, hair accessories and more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a toy under 5 it's amazing both my kids loved it. I miss understood they were not a surprise but the exactly doll you see. That was super cool sense that meant no one would get upset from having a cooler one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves dolls and blind bag toys, so I thought this would be the perfect gift. The packaging it comes in is super cute and fun. I love that the box turns into a playset, and all the accessories come in paper bags. The doll is a lot smaller than I expected and not the best quality, but my daughter liked it anyway. She comes with a variety of accessories that you can add altogether to make a keychain. You can change her outfits, which are made of rubber and surprisingly they were easy to change. Overall my daughter really liked it and has had fun playing with it. I do think it's a bit overpriced though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted this for a gift. I was unsure but went sure why not. It looked cute. I love that the box doubles as a little play area. It was fun watching my daughter unpack all the little items and as shown, we got the girl that was on the box. She had lots of fun playing with her and I think it was really cute. Plus I like that we can put all the items into the little back pack. My daughter can take her on the go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Not much to it. It’s small and pretty much a useless toy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little doll with backpack, accessories and cardboard house
reviews.reviewText: This comes with a cute little purple haired doll, a doll backpack, and some accessories including some that double as Keychain, inside a cardboard box that doubles as a doll house after opening.I ordered this for my 3 year old. She loves the doll and likes using the mini backpack but doesn't use the cardboard house much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 8 year old loved this!
reviews.reviewText: My 8-year-old is obsessed with the surprise inside type toys and this was her favorite one of all of her gifts. She loves the packaging and the surprises were actually of good quality. I'd give it a 5/5!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegó rota y maltratada la caja
reviews.reviewText: Esta bonito pero ya no nos sirvió para regalo porque llegó rota y abierta la caja.
